description: Returns details for the specified Amazon EMR Studio including ID, Name, VPC, Studio access URL, and so on.

nested_items.name: StudioId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon EMR Studio.

nested_items.name: StudioArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon EMR Studio.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon EMR Studio.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The detailed description of the Amazon EMR Studio.

nested_items.name: AuthMode
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the Amazon EMR Studio authenticates users with IAM or IAM Identity Center.

nested_items.name: VpcId
nested_items.description: The ID of the VPC associated with the Amazon EMR Studio.

nested_items.name: SubnetIds
nested_items.description: The list of IDs of the subnets associated with the Amazon EMR Studio.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ServiceRole
nested_items.description: The name of the IAM role assumed by the Amazon EMR Studio.

nested_items.name: UserRole
nested_items.description: The name of the IAM role assumed by users logged in to the Amazon EMR Studio. A Studio only requires a UserRole when you use IAM authentication.

nested_items.name: WorkspaceSecurityGroupId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Workspace security group associated with the Amazon EMR Studio. The Workspace security group allows outbound network traffic to resources in the Engine security group and to the internet.

nested_items.name: EngineSecurityGroupId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Engine security group associated with the Amazon EMR Studio. The Engine security group allows inbound network traffic from resources in the Workspace security group.

nested_items.name: Url
nested_items.description: The unique access URL of the Amazon EMR Studio.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time the Amazon EMR Studio was created.

nested_items.name: DefaultS3Location
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 location to back up Amazon EMR Studio Workspaces and notebook files.

nested_items.name: IdpAuthUrl
nested_items.description: Your identity provider's authentication endpoint. Amazon EMR Studio redirects federated users to this endpoint for authentication when logging in to a Studio with the Studio URL.

nested_items.name: IdpRelayStateParameterName
nested_items.description: The name of your identity provider's RelayState parameter.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: A list of tags associated with the Amazon EMR Studio.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: A user-defined key, which is the minimum required information for a valid tag. For more information, see Tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: A user-defined value, which is optional in a tag. For more information, see Tag Clusters.

nested_items.name: IdcInstanceArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM Identity Center instance the Studio application belongs to.

nested_items.name: TrustedIdentityPropagationEnabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the Studio has Trusted identity propagation enabled. The default value is false.

nested_items.name: IdcUserAssignment
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the Studio has REQUIRED or OPTIONAL IAM Identity Center user assignment. If the value is set to REQUIRED, users must be explicitly assigned to the Studio application to access the Studio.

nested_items.name: EncryptionKeyArn
nested_items.description: The KMS key identifier (ARN) used to encrypt Amazon EMR Studio workspace and notebook files when backed up to Amazon S3.
